name: Circuitron
description:
The aim of the game is to connect the power source to the light bulb(s). There are various connection components in between that must be oriented correctly to make the bulb light up.

The game is mouse controlled throughout. Click on a red connection to rotate clockwise. As power makes its way through the wire, it will turn blue.

There are 10 levels to play through. Good luck, thanks for playing and have fun!

Twitter : twitter.com/BenJames171
